thread.title: Foals are heading out on a UK tour in 2016 with support from Everything Everything - Music
thread.title_full: Foals are heading out on a UK tour in 2016 with support from Everything Everything - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Amy Davidson
title: Foals are heading out on a UK tour in 2016 with support from Everything Everything - Music
text: Foals now have some massive venues fit for their massive new album, and are heading out on their first ever UK arena tour.The band will call at Glasgow, Manchester, London, Birmingham and Leeds in February 2016 with support coming from Everything Everything. Tickets for the tour will go on sale at 9am next Friday (October 9).Foals recently released their fourth album What Went Down, which reached number three in the UK.Meanwhile, Everything Everything's new record Get to Heaven was released earlier this summer, also cracking the Top 10. Foals played a surprise set at Reading Festival in August after revealing they turned down The Libertines' slot at Glastonbury because they were under-prepared.Foals will play the following UK dates:February 12 - Glasgow, The SSE HydroFebruary 13 - Manchester, ArenaFebruary 16 - The SSE Arena, WembleyFebruary 19 - Birmingham, Barclaycard ArenaFebruary 20 - Leeds, First Direct ArenaWatch the music video for Foals' 'What Went Down' below:
